entry.title: Re Beyond seeing a list of all the tokens, you can use the token filter to chart the TVL for a single token. Go to a project's TVL, click the gear ico...
entry.summary: Re Beyond seeing a list of all the tokens, you can use the token filter to chart the TVL for a single token. Go to a project's TVL, click the gear icon, and select a token to view the individual token's TVL, Quantity Locked, & Value Share.

entry.title: Re Want to see all the tokens that make up a protocol's TVL? Or which token is behind a recent increase or decrease? Scroll down to see the TVL, balan...
entry.summary: Re Want to see all the tokens that make up a protocol's TVL? Or which token is behind a recent increase or decrease? Scroll down to see the TVL, balance, and 1-day value change for every token in the protocol.

entry.title: Re Seeing what tokens make up a protocol's TVL and how these change over time can help you gauge a project's ability to attract & retain high-caliber ...
entry.summary: Re Seeing what tokens make up a protocol's TVL and how these change over time can help you gauge a project's ability to attract & retain high-caliber assets. Using the Token TVL Share chart, you can see the top tokens making up a protocol's TVL and the changes over time.

entry.title: Re These subcategories offer a deeper look at the growth and churn rate of a project. See an increase in Monthly Users made primarily of New Users? Th...
entry.summary: Re These subcategories offer a deeper look at the growth and churn rate of a project. See an increase in Monthly Users made primarily of New Users? This might indicate an effective new feature or campaign. More Returning Users than New? This might be a loyal community.

entry.title: Re Want to see if a project is *really* growing its user base? Growth Internals provides insight into a project's trajectory by assessing the number o...
entry.summary: Re Want to see if a project is *really* growing its user base? Growth Internals provides insight into a project's trajectory by assessing the number of New, Returning, Lost, & Resurrected users over time.

entry.title: Re We've heard the feedback on our platform: "Your data is stale." "You only show one metric." "You don't have TVL for chains besides Ethereum." The r...
entry.summary: Re We've heard the feedback on our platform: "Your data is stale." "You only show one metric." "You don't have TVL for chains besides Ethereum." The relevancy of our data sucks, and we agree. It's time to do better.

entry.summary: âœ¨The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the decentralized finance sector. The index is maintained by DeFi Pulse's index division @Scalara_xyz and is available as a single token $DPI implemented by @indexcoop. Scalara:â€‚Over the last 7 days, the DeFi Pulse Index grew 10% when measured in ETH. $DPI Best performers were @compoundfinance, @aave and @iearnfinance. Compound was even up in USD terms, despite the overall market rout.
